text:
@piersmorgan Why did Fauci say it works on coronavirus in 2005 then?
A treatment that the WHO and CDC both agreed with at the same time but suddenly changed their tune when @realDonaldTrump mentions it?Why do you only push fear @piersmorgan your as bad as the virus
